Text: I downloaded Pro Premier 2011, it works OK but doesn't support some features 2010 had (eg., you can't defrag files that can't be moved on bootup, no Ifaast support on the menu, etc). Does this one do all that? Also, is it strictly for servers?

Thanks for this. Install, patch and keymaker all worked fine on XP Pro SP3 laptop PC and defraged all partitions fast.

bert16: all the features in this Server edition are listed on diskeeper's website.
